Class Card

  • java.lang.Object
    • Card

  • public class Card
extends Object
    The Card class creats abn object that represents a playing card by containg an int for the suit of the card and an int for the card number(value)

      • Card

        public Card(int s,
            int v)
        A constructor for a Card object that takes 2 int values that become the suit and value of the card
        Parameters:
        s - an int value that will be the suit of the card
        v - an int value that will be the value of the card

        A copy Contructor to copy another card
